com.facebook.litho

Class Transition.SpringTransitionAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.Transition.SpringTransitionAnimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition.TransitionAnimator
    Enclosing class:
    Transition

    public static class Transition.SpringTransitionAnimator
extends Object
implements Transition.TransitionAnimator
    Creates spring-driven animations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpringTransitionAnimator(double tension, double friction)
      Create spring-driven animator with given tension and friction values.
      SpringTransitionAnimator(SpringConfig springConfig)
      Create spring-driven animator with given SpringConfig.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransitionAnimationBinding createAnimation(PropertyAnimation propertyAnimation) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpringTransitionAnimator

        public SpringTransitionAnimator(double tension,
                                double friction)
        Create spring-driven animator with given tension and friction values. Spring physics implementation is taken from Rebound library and we recommend to use demo provided at http://facebook.github.io/rebound to have a better sense of how friction and tension values work together.

      • SpringTransitionAnimator

        public SpringTransitionAnimator(SpringConfig springConfig)
        Create spring-driven animator with given SpringConfig. Spring physics implementation is taken from Rebound library and we recommend to use demo provided at http://facebook.github.io/rebound to have a better sense of how friction and tension values work together.

    • Method Detail

      • createAnimation

        public TransitionAnimationBinding createAnimation(PropertyAnimation propertyAnimation)
        Specified by:
        createAnimation in interface Transition.TransitionAnimator
        Returns:
        a TransitionAnimationBinding for the given PropertyAnimation that will animate the change in value on this property.
